statements: DELETE FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND hire_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EmployeeRecords WHERE employee_name LIKE 'A%' AND (department = 'HR' OR department = 'Marketing');
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT');
DELETE FROM employees WHERE full_name = 'John Doe' AND department = 'Finance';
DELETE FROM schedule WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employee_records WHERE department = 'HR');
DELETE FROM plant_information WHERE manager_id = (SELECT employee_id FROM employee_records WHERE position = 'Manager');
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE schedule_id IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM schedules WHERE date = '2023-01-01');
DELETE FROM machines WHERE department_id IN (SELECT department_id FROM departments WHERE name = 'Production');
DELETE FROM employees WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM projects WHERE department_id = 2 AND project_name LIKE '%Marketing%';
